page.title: 20CLUBS AND RECREATION
page.content: There are a variety of different clubs in the Crowborough & Rotherfield area,with memberships between 10 & 600 people.They include nursing,table tennis,golf,netball,swimming,riding, football,stoolball,running & darts. Facilities in the area are reasonably good although some clubs have a lack of equipment.Most sports clubs offer their members coaching at an extra cost.People in the area do not spend much money on recreational activities, they find their leisure activities help them to meet new people.The Woman's Institute is a nationwide organisation.Crowborough & Rotherfield branches meet regularly to have discu_ ssions and learn new skills.Emotive subjects like politics and religion are never discussed.Everybody enjoys the club and attends regularly.
